answers.answer: Good luck! It will go in your favour with pre eclampsia your body is done with being pregnant and labours are usually fast. Mine was speedy with my first due to it. All the best!
I no the feeling my doctor told me yesterday I am starting with mild preeclampsia so im gettin ready for them to say iv gota be induced
Yeah I developed it in the past two weeks
What type of symptoms were you having?
Swollen hands and feet. The Dr can tell by the amount of protein in my urine and my blood pressure.
Taking the 24 hr pee test Friday.  May have to be induce I'm only 35 weeks

Yeah I hear you I had pre-eclampsia with my first child then my second I had no complications and now I'm on my third and 35 weeks and have gestational hypertension and will be induced at 37 weeks it's nerve wrecking but keep good thoughts coming and this is more common then we think and with them aware of our situations our unborn children and us have a much better chance of less complications for delievery

question: Hey mommies, I got word from my OB that I just developed preeclampsia so they are inducing me at 37weeks which is this Friday.My baby girl is healthy and growing properly.I thank God for his blessing and protection he has been giving.
title: Due Jan 9, being induced Dec 19
